hero.description: I am a fullstack developer focusing on creating websites that provides user with best experience

about.description: Learn more about my background and skills

background.title: Background
background.description: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with a strong foundation in computer science and a love for creating innovative web solutions. My journey has been driven by curiosity, a commitment to clean and efficient code, and the excitement of turning complex problems into intuitive, user-friendly experiences.

expertise.title: Expertise
expertise.description: I specialize in building robust and scalable web applications using modern technologies, ensuring seamless performance, intuitive user experiences, and clean, maintainable code that stands the test of time.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: I'm proficient in a wide range of technologies and constantly expanding my skill set to stay at the forefront of web development.

approach.title: Approach
approach.description: I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and following best practices. My approach involves understanding client needs, planning thoroughly, and delivering high-quality solutions on time.

goals.title: Goals
goals.description: My goal is to continue growing as a developer, tackling challenging projects, and contributing to the tech community. I'm always excited to learn new technologies and push the boundaries of what's possible in web development.

experience.description: My professional journey in web development

kpnPlantation.title: Middle Full Stack Developer
kpnPlantation.description: Developed and maintained various enterprise projects (operational platforms & business management systems), while leading end-to-end initiatives from planning to release.

extremeNetwork.title: Junior Full Stack Developer
extremeNetwork.description: Developed and maintained multiple client projects ranging from e-commerce platforms to business management systems.

frontend.title: Frontend Developer
frontend.description: Focused on creating intuitive user interfaces and improving user experience for various startup projects.

junior.title: Junior Web Developer
junior.description: Started my professional journey as a junior developer, learning industry best practices and contributing to various client projects.

portfolio.description: Showcase of my recent work and projects

event.title: EventKu - Ticket provider for all events
event.description: EventKu is a platform for finding and creating events—from concerts to workshops—with quick searches by interest and location.

mris.title: MRIS - Material Reservation System Information
mris.description: MRIS is a web application for submitting and tracking material requests to the warehouse digitally (paperless).

rkb.title: RKB/RKT - Monthly or annual work plan
rkb.description: RKB is a Web application for compiling, uploading, and validating monthly work plans—covering Harvesting, Upkeep, to Contract with monthly period filters and neat recap tables.

psaweb.title: PSAWEB - Online map application (survey web GIS)
psaweb.description: PSA WEB is an online map application (survey web GIS) for displaying and managing plantation spatial layers starting from aerial image basemaps to operational layers such as blocks, subdivisions, canals/rivers, roads and plant conditions.

ppa.title: PPA - Photo Proof App
ppa.description: Application that functions to record types of plantation employee activities, so that we can control and view them easily.

discord.title: Mini Discord - platform real-time messaging, voice and video calls
discord.description: Experience the best in online communication with our platform, inspired by Discord, featuring real-time messaging, voice and video calls.

jobseeker.title: JobHuntly - platform job search & employee search
jobseeker.description: JobHuntly is a job search platform to find 5000+ jobs, browse companies, share job for companies, and apply faster based on position title and location.

pwa.title: PWA TNOS App - Service and support TNOS App
pwa.description: TNOS is a support and consultation application that is ready 24/7, helping users feel safer and more comfortable wherever they are.

tnosPayment.title: Payment TNOS - Service and support payment TNOS app and web application
tnosPayment.description: Make it easy to pay with special Xendit payment methods such as Credit Card, Bank Transfer, E-Wallet, & QR Code
